statements.select: SELECT aui.[user_id] ,agi.[name] as group_name ,agi.group_id ,ari.role_id ,ari.[name] as role_name ,afi.function_id ,afi.parent_function_id ,afi.code AS func_code FROM [dbo].[auth_user_info] aui INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_user_group] aug ON aug.[user_id] = aui.[user_id] INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_group_info] agi ON agi.group_id = aug.group_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_group_role] agr ON agr.group_id = agi.group_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_role_info] ari ON ari.role_id = agr.role_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_role_function] arf ON arf.role_id = agr.role_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_function_info] afi ON afi.function_id = arf.function_id WHERE aui.ref_org_user_code = #refUserCode#

SELECT aui.[user_id] ,ari.role_id ,ari.[name] as role_name ,afi.function_id ,afi.parent_function_id ,afi.code AS func_code FROM [dbo].[auth_user_info] aui INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_user_role] aur ON aur.[user_id] = aui.[user_id] INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_role_info] ari ON ari.role_id = aur.role_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_role_function] arf ON arf.role_id = aur.role_id INNER JOIN [dbo].[auth_function_info] afi ON afi.function_id = arf.function_id WHERE aui.ref_org_user_code = #refUserCode#
